author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tourism Minister S.P. Shunmuganathan flagged off a new bus service, from Thoothukudi to Tiruchi via Kovilpatti, here on Friday.

It was a long pending demand of Kovilpatti people, the Minister said.

The bus would go through Ottapidaram, Pasuvanthani, Kovilpatti and Madurai. G.V. Markandeyan, Vilathikulam MLA, Mayor A.P.R. Anthony Grace and TNSTC officials were present.
title: New bus service
